sentences.en: Give her a big round of applause !
He acknowledged the applause with a small bow.
sentences.cn: 他微微地鞠了一躬表示对掌声的感谢。
他得到的掌声并不是很热烈。

sentences.en: He was interrupted by applause umpteen times.
Her dancing brought loud cheers, wolf whistles and applause.
sentences.cn: 她的舞蹈赢来震耳的欢呼声、口哨声和掌声。

sentences.en: I kept hearing the sound of applause in the background.
sentences.cn: 我不断听到隐约的鼓掌声。

sentences.en: Romeo left the stage, to enthusiastic applause.
sentences.cn: 罗密欧在热烈的掌声中离开了舞台。

sentences.en: She got a resounding round of applause.
She got a round of applause (=  a short period of applause  ) when she finished.
sentences.cn: 她结束的时候获得一阵掌声。

sentences.en: She got a round of applause (= a short period of applause) when she finished.
sentences.cn: 她结束的时候获得一阵掌声。

sentences.en: She made her entry to the sound of thunderous applause.
sentences.cn: 她在雷鸣般的掌声中上了场。

sentences.en: Sue got a sympathetic round of applause.
sentences.cn: 休得到了一片赞成的掌声。

sentences.en: The audience responded with thunderous applause.
sentences.cn: 观众报以雷鸣般的掌声。

sentences.en: The conference greeted the speech with rapturous applause.
sentences.cn: 与会人员对该讲演报以热烈的掌声。

trans.tran_en: the sound of many people hitting their hands together and shouting, to show that they have enjoyed something
